attributes.action: remove all religious education and religious guests from schools and stop the underaged from learning about a subject that has no proof
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i want to ban schools from teaching religion in schools as this should be filed under child abuse. i also plead that we ban children under 16 being taugh about religion as they are to young to vote so they must also be to young to understand where they stand in religion. there are no facts that state god excists so shouldnt be taught as fact without hard evidence of a god... thank you for your time

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
